message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $85?
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. I can do $88 for the product. It's a good compromise, don't you think?
